title: inbamAyinum tunbam
sahitya:
inbamAyinum tunbamadanilum enrum unai eNNum varam tA tA


anupallavi

  nanrE un vazhi naDandiDa vAn veLiyilum ivvulagilum unaik-kaNDE


caraNam    alaippilum shalippilum agam uzhalAdu alai mEl alai pAyum aluvalgaL palavilum
nilaiyAm undan nAmam onrE ninaindun sheyal purinden manam niraivura aruL tA
